snippet: A maintenance worker in the prime minister’s residence endured “humiliation, excessive and even unreasonable demands,” the court said, awarding him about $26,000.
abstract: Israeli labor court awards compensation to Guy Eliyahu, former maintenance worker at residence of Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu who claims to have been abused by Netanyahu's wife Sara; ruling deals latest blow in string of accusations against Netanyahus.
lead_paragraph: A maintenance worker in the prime minister’s residence endured “humiliation, excessive and even unreasonable demands,” the court said, awarding him about $26,000.

headline.main: Israeli Worker Wins Case Claiming Abusive Treatment by Sara Netanyahu
headline.print_headline: Israeli Worker Wins Case Claiming Abusive Treatment by the Wife of Netanyahu
